title: LP Gain and Loss
body:
Hi,

So I just played two ranked games in a row, I won the first one and gained only 13LP which left me on 93LP, I would generally get 20-24 which would've put me in series, so then I had to play one more match and win to get into series. I lost, and I lost 24LP... Why would I gain 13, and lose 24.. my ranked win loss is 57-63 so I shouldn't be losing almost double of what I gain. Please help...
